reviews.review:
The Best one of the franchise. The story is exquisite, the gameplay is awesome.
9.5/10

Одна из немногих игр, про которые действительно можно сказать - искусство.

Обязательно играть, любить и хранить в сердце.
Played through this game twice on xbox. this game can be sumarised as "Paradox:The Video Game"
BEST
Juego maravilloso, totalmente recomendable de dieh

每个男人都有一座灯塔  
一张扁舟
幻梦般的雨夜落下
和地窖微光的吉他
像晴羽掠影
或仰面施洗  或溯流而上
直到往昔岁月



There are loved ones in the glory，

你时常会想起那些，

Whose dear forms you often miss.

你曾深爱的人们。

When you close your earthly story,

当你结束尘世故事，

Will you join them in their bliss?

是否会加入他们？

Will the circle be unbroken，

命运轮回最终能否，

By and by, by and by?

永远不被打破？

Is a better home awaiting，

是否会有更好的家，

In the sky, in the sky?

在空中等着你？

In the joyous days of childhood，

你在童年时常听到，

Oft they told of wondrous love，

人们讲述祂的爱，

Pointed to the dying Saviour;

还有将死的救世主；

Now they dwell with Him above.

他们大概已团聚。

Will the circle be unbroken，

命运轮回最终能否，

By and by, by and by?

永远不被打破？

Is a better home awaiting，

是否会有更好的家，

In the sky, in the sky?

在空中等着你？

You remember songs of heaven，

儿时的你声音稚嫩，

Which you sang with childish voice.

将天堂之歌唱响。

Do you love the hymns they taught you,

你更喜爱那些颂歌？

Or are songs of earth your choice?

还是尘世的歌曲？

Will the circle be unbroken，

命运轮回最终能否，

By and by, by and by?

永远不被打破？

Is a better home awaiting，

是否会有更好的家，

In the sky, in the sky?

在空中等着你？

You can picture happy gath'rings，

你能想到很久以前，

Round the fireside long ago,

在火堆旁的欢聚，

And you think of tearful partings，

你又想到与朋友们，

When they left you here below.

悲伤的生死离别。

Will the circle be unbroken，

命运轮回最终能否，

By and by, by and by?

永远不被打破？

Is a better home awaiting，

是否会有更好的家，

In the sky, in the sky?

在空中等着你？

One by one their seats were emptied.

一个接一个座位空了，

One by one they went away.

他们已经离开了。

Now the family is parted.

家庭已经支离破碎，

Will it be complete one day?

我们能否再重逢？

Will the circle be unbroken，

命运轮回最终能否，

By and by, by and by?

永远不被打破？

Is a better home awaiting，

是否会有更好的家，

In the sky, in the sky?

在空中等着你。
I love this game
Great storyline, graphics and gameplay.

Wow, I just beat this game and I have to say.
This game is incredible, At first the combat might seem boring and it is. But the story is addicting. and touching.
The second picture of the game on this page shows where it all begins.
This game is a Must have and 100% worth the $30
Go get the game!
What are you waiting for!!!!!
Güzel hikaye Süper grafikler.
Beautiful graphics and story(and Elizabeth).

This game is amazing! The story is amazing. You really care about these characters, and the atmosphere of the world is phenominal. This game (and its wonderful DLC which is 100% worth the money) goes on sale all the time. You can pick up at any major steam sale for dirt cheap ($7.50 or $14.99 with all the DLC [USD]). For that price, its more than worth picking up.
Lovely game and awesome history!

9/10. needs more minoin

Конечно же игра старовата на данный момент, но она давольно играбельна даже сегодня. Она так же захватывает своей сюжетной линией как и прежде. Сама отмосфера альтернативной реальности, где происходят все действия, заставляет с восторгом смотреть на парящий в небе город!

It's a great game when you take your time. I recommend taking your time to explore all the areas and take in the enviroments you're in.

Pros
- Decent story
- Not bad shooting mechanics 


Cons
- DLC is a bit short but still enjoable
Awesome story, amazing gameplay, really recommend playing it!

QUE TEZAAAAAAAAAAAAAO
A masterpiece everybody have to play this

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado, creo que no es necesario decirlo ya que la mayoria lo conoce y sabe que es un gran juego.

la verdad este titulo es el mejor de los tres de la saga, no necesitas jugar los otros dos para entender la historia (aunque te recomiendo jugar todos los juegos de esta gran saga)

La historia es muy atrapante, interesante y a mi parecer es una de las mejores historias en el mundo de los videojuegos.

La jugabilidad es divertida, retadora (si lo juegas en dificultades altas) y te hacen sentir parte del juego, al igual que sentir  una conexion con tu compañera que te ayudara en el juego.

Es un gran juego sin duda.

Verlo y jugarlo es una experiencia preciosa y divertida. La historia es interesante y te hace querer saber aún más. El DLC panteón marino es genial. El desarrollo del juego podría haber sido algo menos lineal pero te hace querer explorar todo el escenario antes de abandonarlo.

Me hice cuenta en steam solo por este juego en su momento.
一个字，好！
10/10 awesome story, would buy again :D

I binged played the game over two days and I loved it! Totally worth buying it. The weak point of the game is that sometimes, though rarely, it is unclear what the game expects from us. You run around for a couple mins until you figure out the proper door. It might just be me.

On the other side, the story was absolutely amazing and the visuals/music got me immersed right away.

One of best games ever made. All time fav. Actually, it's more than a game, an artwork. 
The great story and scientific background behind it, amazing graphics, rich environment.
The time you will pass while playing this game, will always be remembered. I guarentee it.

Story-driven FPS game. It already got its praise on release, so there is not much to be said about it. Repetitive gameplay is compensated by the immersing environment of the game's world and the rich story. If you deem story important in a game, you probably already played this one but if you didn't, you should check this out

It's probably my favorite fps I have ever played.

Впервые проходил игру когда она вышла, мне она очень зашла, но из за некоторых обстоятельств пришлось её дропнуть...
В 2018 купил её чтобы наконец-то пройти до конца. 
Что тут можно сказать? Это шедевр. 

1. Хочется изначально отметить то, что с первый и второй биошок были очень душные. Постоянно были проблемы то с солями, то с хп, то с деньгами, патронами, стволами, ботов было много и их сложно выносить.. Но тут такого нет - все можно спокойно пройти и никаких проблем не испытываешь.  
2. Графика, она прекрасна.
3. Атмосфера. 
4. Харизматичные и отлично проработанные персонажи.
5. Много оружия. 
6. Хороший сюжет. 
7. Способности. Их много и они разнообразны. (правда, ими я почти не пользовался, стрелять мне нравилось больше)
8. Апгрейды. (стволов, скиллов)
9. Порадовала отссылка к первому биошоку в последней миссии. Перенесли самую первую локацию. 

Минусы:
нет.
